Orlean Puckett (U.S. National Park Service)
s: Born in North Carolina, Orlean Hawks Puckett received little formal education before she married John Puckett at about age sixteen. They settled close to his family near Groundhog Mountain in Patrick County. Her first child was born in 1862 but died a few months later of diphtheria.

t: Puckett House | "Aunt Orlean" Puckett (1837-1939) and her hu… | Flickr
s: April 1, 2025 - "Aunt Orlean" Puckett (1837-1939) and her husband, John, farmed and lived here near Groundhog Mountain, VA. Even though she lost all 24 of her babies in infancy, Aunt Orlean went on to deliver over a 1000 babies in the mountains of VA after she turned 50. She never lost a baby or its mother ...
